proposed_strategy.name: Single Prapathaka Chunk
proposed_strategy.description: The entire Seventh Prapathaka is processed as a single chunk as its total character count is significantly below the safety limit of 125,000.

execution_plan.description: Chhandogya Upanishad, Saptama Prapathaka (Khandas 1 through 26) with commentary.

parsing_instructions.justification: The Prapathaka is divided into Khandas, which serve as the definitive structural and thematic units within the Upanishad.

start_pattern.description: A new Khanda begins with its ordinal number (in Devanagari) followed by 'खण्डः', usually preceded by an explicit newline or header formatting.

end_pattern.description: The end of a Khanda's commentary is marked by a concluding line mentioning 'खण्डभाष्यम्'.

parsing_instructions.pre_content_handling: The first Khanda follows immediately after the Prapathaka title; no separate prefatory section requires designation.
